agency_desc: A non-profit that provides guide dogs to people who are blind and visually impaired to enhance their mobility, independence and quality of life.
service_description: Provides a trained guide dog and a 25-day training program, including travel expenses and room and board, free of charge to legally blind individuals. Special training programs are also available for deaf-blind individuals and for teens.
site_details: Visit the website to apply or print and mail in application. Call for information.
site_eligibility: Legally blind or visually Impaired -- Age 16 or older -- In good mental and physical health

agency_desc: A non-profit that provides guide dogs to people who are blind and visually impaired to enhance their mobility, independence and quality of life.
service_description: Provides a one-week white-cane- orientation and mobility that takes place in a variety of environments. One-on-one instruction is tailored to each client’s capabilities and needs. Transportation to and from a client’s home to the Leader Dog campus, along with accommodations and meals while training, are also provided.
site_details: Visit the website to apply or print and mail in application. Call for information.
site_eligibility: Legally blind or visually Impaired -- Age 16 or older -- In good mental and physical health

agency_desc: A commercial organization that provides home and GPS tracking medical alert devices and trained operators that monitor and dispatch first responders or call pre-arranged emergency contacts 24/7 based on the need. This service is designed to preserve an individual's safety and independence.
service_description: Provides electronic equipment which connects frail seniors or people who have disabilities with police or other emergency response personnel after a fall, injury, or other medical emergencies.  Electronic devices that can be rented include Personal Emergency Response Systems (PERS) for home or mobile units with GPS tracking, and Auto Fall Sensors.  Additional features that are available include smoke, fire, or carbon monoxide detectors.
site_details: Call to schedule an appointment. Be advised discounts are offered to private pay callers that mention CICOA or any area agency.
site_eligibility: Individuals at risk of falls or other injuries -- Individuals at risk of isolation
